title: INTRODUCTION TO DATA ANALYSIS FOR MEDIA STUDIES - Lecturer: Fabio Giglietto - A.Y. 2024/2025 - Credits 5

title: Decoding the News Media Diet of Disinformation Spreaders
description: This paper on arXiv discusses the news media consumption patterns of individuals who spread disinformation, a topic closely related to Fabio Giglietto's expertise in disinformation studies.
